Sentencas: As a conventional anode for solid oxide fuel cell, Ni/YSZ has been deeply investigated in many aspects.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: However, little is known on the atomic structure of the Ni/YSZ interface, which is quite important for the reaction activity and stability.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: Herein, a conventional cell was prepared by mixing/sintering/reduction process.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: The crystallographic orientation-relationships and contact surfaces between Ni and YSZ were investigated by transmission electron microscopy (TEM), and scanning TEM.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: The TEM specimens were prepared by focused ion beam-scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: It was found that the Ni/YSZ orientation relationships ate much more complicated than those samples prepared by directionally solidified eutectics and deposition methods.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: Higher-index and step contact surfaces were observed or estimated, such as Ni(15 13 1)/YSZ(4 4 10).
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: This interface structure was analyzed with the help of atomistic models.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: The misfits were found to be small in both x and y directions.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: Further geometric analysis by near coincidence site lattice theory indicates that this interface is relatively stable.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: It is supposed that various Ni/YSZ interfaces exist in a conventional cell and stay in different energy states.
Titulo: Observation of the Ni/YSZ Interface in a Conventional SOFC

Sentencas: The unstable and metastable interfaces should be considered when we discuss the long term stability of cell during the operation.
